attributes.action: Re-take back Italy Prime Minister's heart, kick Hwa Chi Lin away from Italy Prime Minister's 5% friendship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

We learn that Hwa Chi Lin had achieved 5 ~ 10% friendship with Italy Prime Minister and Hwa Chi Lin had pushed some italian to physical death.

We need England to sent England Minister's team or European Minister's team to Italy, to take back the heart of Italy Prime Minister and kick Hwa Chi Lin out of Italy.

If Hwa Chi Lin have 100% influence in Europe, Hwa Chi Lin wouldn't pay a single cents / pences of the 75 GBP.

That's why we urge you to take actions onto the unmerciful Hwa Chi Lin.

regards

It's urgent issue.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
